Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to health insurance for state officers and employees who receive health insurance benefits from the state
Summary: Requires health insurance for state officers and employees who receive health insurance benefits from the state to take effect immediately upon employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง161, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to health insurance for state officers and employees who receive health insurance benefits from the state
